ModMetaData.name: Misc. Endgame
ModMetaData.author: Haplo
ModMetaData.description:
And if thy survive the onslaught by a pair of moon, this will be your price ol' civic right in thee harvest soon.
Here it is... The Endgame! Can you survive a couple of days of martial law?
Do you think your outpost is done? You have nothing more to do, but you don't really want to leave the planet? Why not try to get your own town charter via martial law instead? Here is your option for it...
(Version: 1.0.1) Languages: English, German
Hints: - Do some research. - Build Annunciator, send transmission. - Survive!
